member.name: T:Bwl.Network.Transport.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: Класс ресурса со строгой типизацией для поиска локализованных строк и т.д.

member.name: P:Bwl.Network.Transport.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Возвращает кэшированный экземпляр ResourceManager, использованный этим классом.

member.name: P:Bwl.Network.Transport.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Перезаписывает свойство CurrentUICulture текущего потока для всех обращений к ресурсу с помощью этого класса ресурса со строгой типизацией.

member.name: T:Bwl.Network.Transport.TCPTransport
member.summary: TCP-based Packet Transport with big packets support, sync or async sending. If SendPacket completed (no exception), it means packet fully sent and fully received by other side.

member.name: T:Bwl.Network.Transport.UDPTransportSimple
member.summary: UDP-based Packet Transport with only protocol-based features. Packet length must be less than 64k, no acknowledgments, only async sending. If SendPacket completed (no exception), it means that packet is sent, but no information about delivery status.

member.name: T:Bwl.Network.Transport.UDPTransport
member.summary: UDP-based Packet Transport with big packets support, acknowledgments, retransmits, sync or async sending. If SendPacket completed (no exception), it means packet fully sent and fully received by other side.
